post:
In recent events, LET members have been banned from signing up with some providers in Dallas, Texas.    
In light of that, I welcome you :)       
Here are some offers for LET members.     
  
**KVM PLANS IN DALLAS, TEXAS**              
Limited Quantity, 4 of each package available. 
 
 * 2 CPU Cores (Equal Share)     
 * 512 MB Ram    
 * 50 GB RAID10 Disk space    
 * 1000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)      
 * 1 x IPv4 address     
 Price:   $6/quarter          
[Order Here!](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=59)        
                          
 -------------------------------------------------
 * 2 CPU Cores (Equal Share)
 * 1024 MB Ram
 * 120 GB RAID10 Disk space
 * 2000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
 * 1 x IPv4 address       
 Price:   $12/quarter          
[Order Here!](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=61)         
                
                                 
 -------------------------------------------------
     
   Instead of a bundle deal, here is a promo code for 25% on all locations.   
Get as many as you like and get 25% off.   
                        
Use Promo Code: **O8A4YGT8KO** to get 25% on all available locations and packages.      
[Order Here!](https://my.freecpanelsharedhosting.com/cart.php?gid=11)        
      
All orders are pro-rated, final price might differ if you have services with me before as the renewal date is set to the same day as your other services.     
   
Any questions?
